ai-tha-ap197:1.2_0: like a spoon the mountain named.
ai-tha-ap197:1.3_0: I longed for it, took it away,
ai-tha-ap197:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap197:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap197:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap197:3.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap197:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Siṅgālaka.
ai-tha-ap197:7.1_0: The fifth Elder Isipatana was the fifth
